about_the_game:
The Golden Horde: Survival is a third-person medieval survival RPG.

The game takes you to the brutal and mysterious 13th century, where the mighty Golden Horde rises to power. Break free from slavery, survive, build your own settlement, and lead a rebellion in a world where real history intertwines with elements of fantasy.




Join one of the factions to find allies in the unforgiving medieval world.

Choose your path: become a loyal supporter or a secret rebel. Fight for freedom, lead an uprising against the mighty empire, and rewrite the history of your era. Your choices will shape the fate of your faction and the entire world.



Embark on an exciting journey through an open world filled with mysterious caves and dangerous dungeons.

Explore hidden corners, find treasures, and battle enemies to free the enslaved. Every life you save brings you closer to creating a new, free world!



Surviving in the medieval world is the ultimate test of endurance!

Beware of deadly diseases, avoid poisonous snake bites, and steer clear of accidents. Take care of your body—losing a limb could be fatal. Conquer hunger and thirst, evade the threat of slavery, and fight for every single day of your life. Here, every step could be your last, and every decision is a matter of life and death.



Immerse yourself in an ancient era where your destiny is forged by your own hands.

Build cozy yurts and transform desolate lands into a thriving village. Explore vast territories in search of rare resources, and craft weapons and tools to face the challenges of a harsh medieval life. Your story is a legend of survival, craftsmanship, and courage.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains heavy combat displaying realistic injuries such as limb severence, blood and death.
Depictions and mentions of war, displacement, slave trade.

name: The Golden Horde: Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400, AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650, 4 GB or AMD Radeon RX 570
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (x64)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12600K or AMD Ryzen 5 7600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060, 8 GB or AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT, 16 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

short_description: The Golden Horde: Survival takes you to the brutal and mysterious 13th century, where the mighty Golden Horde rises to power. Break free from slavery, survive, build your own settlement and lead a rebellion in a world where real history intertwines with elements of fantasy.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian*, Turkish, Czech, Swedish, Japanese, Uzbek*
*languages with full audio support
